original_text: you are to deliver this man to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.
korean_text: 이런 자를 사탄에게 내주었으니 이는 육신은 멸하고 영은 주 예수의 날에 구원을 받게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: you are to deliver this man to Satan
for the destruction of the flesh
so that his spirit may be saved
in the day of the Lord
